text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Photos: Hou Decide: The Final Debate HOUSTON - A behind-the-scenes look at HOU Decide: The Final Debate. KHOU 11 News Anchor Greg Hurst moderates the final debate with seven of the Houston mayoral candidates answering tough questions before early voting begins on Monday, October 19.
